MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG2 postcode area of Dumfries, affecting properties in Holywood and surrounding areas. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.30AM due to repairs required to our overhead line network on Croftmaggot Road and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to equipment replacements required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.04PM on 15 November 2020.
